revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}'''Doomworld''' is, as stated on the site, "The definitive source for Doom news, information, and development." It is one of the first Doom-related websites in existence, sort of branching off from an earlier site called Functional Entropy. Doomworld was founded by Linguica, Covaro, and Mordeth, on March 14th, 1998.
Doomworld nominated a hundred mods as the "[[Top 100 WADs of All Time]]" for its December 2003 retrospective of Doom's first decade, and since then holds annual "[[Cacowards]]" to honor the most remarkable mods released within the year.
== External links ==
*[http://www.doomworld.com Doomworld] [[Category:Websites]]
